text:
NEW: @MattHancock says government will ban ALL OUTSIDE exercise under the lockdown if people dont follow the rules by sunbathing and socialising, having BBQs etc

On #Marr he says: "if you don't want us to ban exercise then you have got" to follow the rules #coronavirus
